resources.string: How Much Do You Know About Consent? Quiz
Silence or non-communication must never be interpreted as consent.
A person is capable of giving consent if they are asleep, unconscious or otherwise unable to communicate
There could be rape in marriage.
A person who has been threatened or coerced (e.g. is not agreeing voluntarily) into engaging in the sexual activity is not consenting to it;
The fact that consent was given in the past to a sexual relationship means that consent is deemed to exist for all future sexual activity
A person can\'t withdraw consent at any time during the course of a sexual encounter.
All the following are correct: (Dicey Question)
Consent can be given on behalf of another person.
Victim shaming is a reason people don\'t report rape cases.
What is the legal age of consent in Nigeria?
Sex without consent in marriage is excusable?
If abused by a person of same sex, does that make you gay?
